wikipedia_page.main: Albert Fear (25 August 1907 – 26 July 2000) was a Welsh rugby union flanker who played club rugby for Abertillery RFC and Newport and international rugby for Wales.

response: *26 July – Albert Fear, Wales international rugby player, 92
*25 August – Albert Fear, Wales international rugby player (died 2000)
